nodes.beat: Dr. Frank, a brilliant geneticist, begins work on a revolutionary project to create life from DNA fragments.
Dr. Frank successfully creates a humanoid, Adam, using advanced genetic engineering.
Adam/Eve, confused and scared, escapes from the laboratory.
Dr. Frank realises the potential danger and starts a city-wide search for Adam/Eve.
Adam, while wandering, accidentally causes panic and destruction in the city.
Dr. Frank locates Adam and manages to calm him down, explaining his origins.
Dr. Frank and Adam return to the lab, where Dr. Frank promises to help Adam understand his existence.
Dr. Frank creates a humanoid, Eve, with the aim of creating a perfect human.
Eve, while exploring, saves a child from a car accident using her enhanced abilities.
The incident makes local news, helping Dr. Frank locate Eve.
Dr. Frank apologizes to Eve for the confinement and promises to respect her freedom.
Dr. Frank, now a renowned scientist, works on a project to enhance human abilities using genetic engineering.
Adam, while exploring the city, helps in capturing a dangerous criminal using his enhanced abilities.
Dr. Frank, seeing the news, locates Adam and explains his origins.
Adam agrees to return to the lab, seeing the potential good he can do with his abilities.
Eve, while wandering in the city, helps in a major disaster rescue operation using her enhanced abilities.
Dr. Frank, seeing the news, locates Eve and acknowledges her desire for freedom.
